ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: New to group
ygData.msgSnippet: I m not sure how that happened... All you d need to do is click on the new server (it s been at the bottom of the server list) and then click the Create a new
ygData.messageBody:
I'm not sure how that happened... All you'd need to do
is click on the new server (it's been at the bottom of
the server list) and then click the Create a new
character button. Anyone can start a character there.

I'm not sure why it would ask if you want to transfer
your characters, since there will be no transfers to
that server for at least a year, and maybe none after
that.

Good luck. :)

--- Enie <dawn_marie@...> wrote:
> Good morning everyone,
> I was wondering if I could start a new character on
> the new server? I
> tried it last night and it asked me if I wanted to
> transfer the
> characters I already have to the new server :(
>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, Melanie Johnson
> <melanie_6602@y...>
> wrote:
> > Welcome to the group! No toons on the Rathe, and I
> > recently started up on the new server, Stromm.
> Kinda
> > weird, seeing all the newbie zones full (112 in
> > Nektulos last night) and people actually making
> and
> > buying tattered armor. :) It's really fun.
> >
> > --- Randy <morat68@y...> wrote:
> > > I wanted to post real quick and say hello. I've
> been
> > > playing EQ for
> > > about 2 1/2 years now. I play on the Rathe
> server,
> > > if anyone needs
> > > anything feel free to ask. My toons are as
> follows:

> > > Fariel - 51 wiz
> > > Morrog - 26 necro
> > > Wahupta - 20 ranger
> > > Glorfindol - 16 pally
> > > Khaoslord - 12 mage
> > > Lyzzarddo - 11 monk
> > > Hughmun - 10 shammy
> > > The guild I belong to is called "Cries on Havoc"
> > > I'm also curious if anyone lives around St.
> Louis,
> > > Mo.
